metadataAttributes.Title: Fundamentals of Investing
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This is primarily aimed at novice investors who want to better understand the concept of investing and how it can fit into their overall financial plan. Taught by a CERTIFIED FINANCIAL PLANNER™ Professional, this course will cover different investment vehicles, risk tolerance, diversification, and the difference between active and passive investing, as well as investment fees and taxes.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Investment Fees,Diversification,Active vs. Passive Investing,Risk Aversion,Investment,
